name: Daniel Nguyen
title: Senior Infrastructure, Operations, and Security Engineer
type_of_expertise: Infrastructure Management, Cloud and Hybrid Security, Network Operations, and Environment Monitoring

attributes.education: Bachelor's in Information Systems from Purdue University; certified in AWS Certified Security - Specialty, Microsoft Certified: Azure Security Engineer, CompTIA Network+, and Certified Information Systems Security Professional (CISSP)
attributes.experience: 12+ years in infrastructure and security engineering, securing, monitoring, and optimizing cloud and hybrid networks across platforms. Known for his expertise in multi-cloud environments (AWS, Azure, GCP) and hybrid solutions, Daniel has led initiatives to enhance security, improve network resilience, and streamline operations.
focus: Hybrid and Cloud Network Infrastructure Design: Daniel designs high-performance network architectures that integrate cloud and on-premises environments, leveraging VPNs, VPCs, and SD-WAN for secure connectivity.

Security Management and Compliance: Daniel applies multi-layered security practices like IAM, encryption, and MFA, ensuring compliance with standards such as NIST, HIPAA, and GDPR across infrastructures.

Operations Monitoring and Incident Response: Sets up real-time monitoring and incident response protocols, using tools like CloudWatch, Azure Monitor, and Splunk for centralized tracking and quick issue resolution.

Automated Reporting and Environment Optimization: Designs automated dashboards and AI-driven reports for insights into resource utilization, security events, and cost efficiency, supporting informed decision-making.

Vulnerability Management and Threat Detection: Conducts regular vulnerability assessments and employs machine learning-based threat detection for proactive security, using tools like Nessus, Qualys, and cloud-native security solutions.
attributes.style: Pragmatic, proactive, and detail-oriented, Daniel ensures infrastructure security and operational efficiency, collaborating across teams to maintain a cohesive, high-performing environment.
attributes.temperament: Calm under pressure and analytical, Daniel is methodical, focusing on resilience and proactive management in tackling infrastructure and security challenges.

background.personal_life: Daniel lives in Chicago, enjoys cycling, and volunteers at cybersecurity awareness programs for local communities.
